data.name: Dialog.Description
data.value: You have added H5Ps as external learning material. H5Ps must be validated for functionality before they can be successfully used in a learning world. This validation checks whether points can be earned by answering questions (e.g., H5P "Interactive Video"), making the H5P completable (displayed as a completable H5P = 🟢), or if it is not completable, where points are awarded merely by opening it (e.g., H5P "Image Slider", displayed as a non-completable H5P = 🟡). Some H5Ps may also be faulty or not display at all (shown as broken H5P = 🔴). Learn more here.

data.name: Dialog.Instruction
data.value: Click the corresponding icon next to each unvalidated H5P in the list below to validate it. Alternatively, you can validate them later. Unvalidated H5Ps are marked with the following symbol (🕓).
